ComicInfo.Summary:
receives a mysterious delivery from the Almighty Tallest! Then mysterious orders! Then totally different mysterious orders that will probably hurt a lot! Is this the most important assignment of his invader career, or are the Tallest just really, really bored?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Aaron Alexovich & Rikki Simons | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Jhonen Vasquez | 2 | RE | Hot Topic Exclusive Variant Cover | FSc | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-04 23:17:46. [CVDB503611]
